frameDefinitions: A Speaker addresses an Audience on a particular Topic.
An Agent resumes participation in an Activity.
An Entity is undergoing a change in age typically associated with some deterioration or change in state.
A Speaker declares that they will no longer be involved with the Content.
Through a  Message, a Speaker (sometimes encoded metonymically by a Medium) communicates the relative importance of the state of affairs denoted by the Message.
This frame deals with a Speaker communicating a reply or response, a Message, to some prior communication or action, the Trigger.  ''
frameExamples: McNamara <t>addressed</t> congress on the state of affairs of the Department of Defense.
Normal Service Will Be <t>Resumed</t> Shortly. CNI
That will only be possible if and when the IRA <t>renounces</t> armed struggle.
Reid <t>emphasized</t> that he and Dean meet every month.
The landlord has not yet <t>replied</t> in writing to the tenant objecting the proposed alterations.DNI
listRoleDefinitions: The person or persons to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers their text.
The person who orally delivers a text about a <fen>Topic</fen> to a passive <fen>Audience</fen>.
What the text that the <fen>Speaker</fen> produces is about.
The <fen>Time</fen> describes when the speaking occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the speaking occurs.
The <fen>Activity</fen> which is being resumed by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> who resumes an <fen>Activity</fen> that they were engaged in earlier.
When the Activity is resumed.
Where the event takes place.
The <fen>Entity</fen> which is undergoing aging.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> ages.
This role indicates where the <fen>Entity</fen> is located.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates their cessation of association with the <fen>Content</fen>.
The idea that the <fen>Speaker</fen> no longer associates with, whether it be an activity, a propostion, or a group.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement of renunciation.
The time when the statement is made.
The role specifies the place where the statement takes place.
The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a <fen>Message</fen> to another person.
The proposition whose denotation the Speaker presents as important.
The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed.
The time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates a <fen>Message</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers the <fen>Message</fen>.

The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the sentient entity that communicates the reply or response. It is expressed as the External Argument of predicative uses of a <t>Target</t> verb or as the Genitive modifier of a <t>Target</t> noun:
This is the person to whom the response is communicated.  When expressed, this role occurs as the direct object of a <t>Target</t> verb, or in a prepositional phrase introduced by 'to':
The <fen>Message</fen> is the role that identifies the content of what the <fen>Speaker</fen> is communicating to the <fen>Addressee</fen>. It can be expressed as a direct quote or a clause.
<fen>Topic</fen> occurs quite rarely in this frame and usually only as a PP Complement of a noun <t>Target</t>:
The <fen>Trigger</fen> is the prior communication or action to which a response is given. It can occur as an NP Object or a PP Complement.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  makes a verbal response.
listRoleExamples: He lectured <fex>to the officers of the Scots Guard</fex>  in  1929.
<fex>You</fex> have to sermonize about the good times
He was the Director: he could lecture <fex>on whomever he liked</fex>.
We have renewed <fex>our efforts to gain federal recognition</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> renewed our efforts to get things completed.
Bonnie Charlie then renounced <fex>his aspirations to the throne</fex>.
Castro renounced all involvement with the group <fex>over the radio</fex>.
<fex>Juhl</fex> emphasized the importance of UPMC System investments, stating that their contribution to the school's funds had tripled in recent years.
He emphasized to me <fex>that my words will go down in history and that this poem has made a difference in our world</fex>.
<fex>The report</fex> emphasized that Iraq's unwillingness to cooperate represents a serious problem for the progress of this work.
However, Cockerill stressed <fex>last week</fex> that he had had many meetings about these obvious synergies and that he had pursued these aggressively.
Putin stressed <fex>in Beijing</fex> that Russia does not favor independence for Taiwan.
My boss still hasn't given me an answer <fex>about a promotion</fex>.
A reminder letter was sent to all nonrespondents who had not replied <fex>after 28 days</fex>.
This was how Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa responded <fex>in the Assembly</fex> on November 5, 2003.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Press Start Symphony of Games
Reaching Out to the Truth - Vocal Tracks in Persona 4
Persona for the Playstation Portable in Japan
the Press Start Symphony of Games
